languages.text: The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Призрачный волк мчится сквозь противника, завершая движение на клетке с его противоположной стороны. Затем он совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, накладывая эффект {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a melee attack which inflicts the fluxing effect for 2 rounds.
The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a melee attack which inflicts the fluxing effect for 2 rounds.
The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a melee attack which inflicts the fluxing effect for 2 rounds.

The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: 鬼狼穿过敌人，在目标敌人对面格子结束行动。之后，鬼狼对目标敌人进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，施加{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 鬼狼穿过敌人，在目标敌人对面格子结束行动。之后，鬼狼对目标敌人进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}，施加{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}熔化{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: ゴーストウルフは敵の間を走り抜け、敵の反対側のセルで移動を終了する。そして彼らは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、それは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}効果を付与する。

They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: El lobo espectral atraviesa a un enemigo y termina su movimiento en la casilla del lado opuesto del oponente. Después, realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

Призрачный волк мчится сквозь противника, завершая движение на клетке с его противоположной стороны. Затем он совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, накладывая {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}плавления{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text: Der Geisterwolf sprintet durch einen Gegner und beendet seine Bewegung auf dem Feld auf der gegenüberliegenden Seite des Gegners. Dann führt er einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, der 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g} verursacht.
languages.original_text: The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Geisterwolf sprintet durch einen Gegner hindurch und beendet seine Bewegung in dem Feld auf der gegenüberliegenden Seite des Gegners. Dann führt er einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, der den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzen{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} verursacht.

languages.text: Le loup-fantôme fond sur un ennemi et s'arrête sur la case située de l'autre côté de celui-ci. Il enchaîne avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Ghostwolf dashes through an enemy, ending movement in the cell on the enemy's opposite side. They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Loup-Fantôme fond sur un ennemi et s'arrête sur la case située de l'autre côté de celui-ci. S'ensuit alors une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Fusion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Hayalkurt, bir düşmanı yarıp geçerek hareketi düşmanın diğer tarafındaki hücrede bitirir. Ardından {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}eritme{/g} etkisi oluşturan bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapar. Bu etki 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

They then make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} which inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
